title: I got hacked
body: I just logged on, when the Yorick update came out and my RP were away! I looked at my Purchase list and I saw that  I made gifts to guys i dont even know?! But i am saving up my RP and im so angry about that guy! And im also sad because i lost Money. So my Question is: is Riot able to Undo my Purchases and give me the RP it is worth? If Yes, i would really be Happy about that! He didnt even change my Password or anything erlse?! So there it says I gave stuff to; -snip- Can you please help me?

replies.body: I've snipped out the summoner names in your post for privacy reasons.  If you are finding unauthorized charges or access to your account, it's crucial that you take steps to[ secure your account.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account)  You can reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our account team can look into any reparations.  We'll respond asap!
